attributes.action: Abandon job centre physical appointments and phone calls only.while coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: For the public and their families that are immune compromised and fatal risks cause from coronavirus
attributes.background: Introduce job centre calls cancel physical meetings for claiments and new claiments due to health risks as being told to attend other wise you can't claim .a person claiming and attending could put their own family at risk to claim a benefit which could be done on phone.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced it has suspended jobcentre appointments. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/coronavirus-support-for-employees-benefit-claimants-and-businesses

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
